intro: Heptapleurum glabrum, commonly known as the smooth heptapleurum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Araliaceae. It produces small, white flowers arranged in umbels, which are followed by orange-red berries. Heptapleurum glabrum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its aesthetic appeal and adaptability to various garden conditions.
